quests.title: Green Plate Discovery
quests.description: Find and dine at a restaurant with a Carbon A or A+ rating
quests.carbonFact: Plant-based meals produce 50% less CO2 than meat-based meals

quests.title: Green Your Flight
quests.description: Calculate your flight emissions and contribute SAF to reduce your impact
quests.carbonFact: SAF reduces lifecycle emissions by up to 80% compared to conventional jet fuel

quests.title: Hydration Station
quests.description: Find a water refill station and fill up your reusable bottle
quests.bonusDescription: Use the station near your gate
quests.carbonFact: Each refill saves one 500ml plastic bottle (12g plastic, 100g CO2)
